function initTable(table){
	let tab;
	let newTab;
	let tabs = Ext.getCmp('content-panel');
	if(tab = tabs.items.items.find(element => element.id == table)){
		Ext.getCmp('content-panel').setActiveTab(tab);
	} else {
		switch (table) {
			//<es-section>
			<<<extjsAppTableTabs>>>
			case 'local-dbTable-name':
				newTab = {
					xtype: 'lcObjPLocalDbTableNameList',
					title: table,
					html: table,
					id: table,
					closable: true,
				};
				tab = Ext.getCmp('content-panel').add(newTab);
				Ext.getCmp('content-panel').setActiveTab(tab);
				break;
			>>>extjsAppTableTabs<<<
			//</es-section>
		}
	}
}
